data.title: based in Ferrari home: Maranello
data.meta_description: Ferrari Driving in Italy - based in Maranello, home of Ferrari. Take the wheel of a bright red Ferrari and enjoy these amazing cars in Italy.
data.text:
FERRARI DRIVING IN ITALY

A short break to the home of Ferrari. Certainly a must for any sports car enthusiast dreaming of driving a Ferrari in Italy!

FERRARI, MARANELLO

Visit Maranello, home of Ferrari. Firstly, see the impressive Ferrari factory and marvel at the Ferraris on every corner. Secondly, enjoy lunch at a Ferrari-themed restaurant…

FERRARI MUSEUM

Galeria Ferrari in Maranello displays cars first and foremost. They also showcase images and trophies of Ferrari victories from all over the world. We include a visit to the Casa Enzo Ferrari Museum in Modena too. The museum mainly tells the story of Enzo Ferrari’s life. It also explains the automotive history of the region. Next door is a gallery featuring unique Maserati and Ferrari models.

Also in the area are the Maserati factory, the Lamborghini Factory and the Museo Panini. The latter is a private museum housing the finest collection of Maserati vehicles in Italy. Besides, the Panini family are also cheese-makers. If you feel like tasting local Parmesan cheese, you are in the right place.

TEST DRIVE A FERRARI

In addition, we arrange two exciting test drives in a Ferrari for you. Indeed, we can offer a range of models: California Turbo, Portofino, 488 Spider or 458 Italia. Cruising through the countryside of Italy in a Ferrari certainly is an unforgettable experience!

ON THE TRACK

We can also arrange circuit driving on the race track at Modena. A Ferrari 488 Spider and Ferrari 458 Speciale are both available. Driving a Ferrari in Italy could certainly become a dream come true!

MODENA and MARANELLO

Without doubt, these are famous for cars. Indeed, this is the ‘motown’ of Italy. This region is also a big farming area. Parmesan cheese is made here and a tasting of Parmigiano is a great experience. The famous Balsamic Vinegar of Modena is also produced here and aged in oak barrels. Tastings can be arranged. Besides, Max Mara, the fashion brand, is based just up the road, in the attractive historic town of Reggio Emilia. Indeed, it is an ideal destination for a little light shopping. A perfect treat for a lady on a Ferrari Driving weekend in Maranello with her beloved!! Of course, there are great men’s clothing shops too!
